title: Plate 3, from AKA
description: image of document with six blacked-out rectangles; typed sentence below center remains:  "Orwell's book, Homage to Catalonia, is in my opinion, one of the few politically clear pictures of the complex situation during that first year of the war."; notes and text written and top and left side; from a portfolio of five images
creditline: The Barbara S. Longfellow Fund for Works on Paper
